description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based web application. It initializes the application by rendering the main App component inside the DOM element with ID 'root', and wraps it with React.StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for React DOM to render into, enabling concurrent mode features.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM at the specified root.
